skills.title: Frontend development
skills.description: Proficient in building responsive, user-centric interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Vue.js. Emphasizes performance, accessibility, and clean UI/UX design.

skills.title: Backend-development
skills.description: Experienced in developing scalable server-side applications using Node.js, Express, PHP, and Laravel. Skilled in building RESTful APIs, managing databases, and ensuring application security.

skills.title: Mobile Development
skills.description: Specialized in building native Android apps using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose. Focuses on performance, intuitive UI, and seamless integration with backend systems.

skills.title: Database Management
skills.description: Well-versed in designing, managing, and optimizing relational databases using MySQL and PostgreSQL. Capable of implementing efficient queries, indexing strategies, and data security best practices.

portfolio.title: E-Commerce Website
portfolio.description: An e-commerce web app with product listings, cart, payments using React and Laravel.

portfolio.title: Job Portal
portfolio.description: A full-stack job board where users can apply for jobs. Built with Vue.js and Node.js.

portfolio.title: Mobile Banking App
portfolio.description: Native Android banking app with secure authentication and transaction history.

portfolio.title: Student Management System
portfolio.description: Manages students, courses, and results. Built using PHP and MySQL.

testimonials.description: Working with Allan was a pleasure. He understood the requirements clearly and delivered beyond expectations.
Allan brings both technical skill and creativity to every project. His frontend work is clean, responsive, and user-friendly.
His ability to solve complex backend problems quickly and effectively made our project run smoothly.
